worktree_state.content:
{
  "sourceType": "ideation",
  "ideationType": "code_improvements",
  "ideaId": "ci-005",
  "rationale": "The extraction pipeline stores rawResponses from each model (Gemini, GPT, Claude) in result.debug.rawResponses when saveDebugResponses is enabled. The compareCellDetections function (gridValidator.ts lines 602-644) already computes cell-by-cell disagreement analysis. This data exists but isn't exposed to users.",
  "category": "feature",
  "estimatedEffort": "large",
  "complexity": "large",
  "affectedFiles": [
    "pips-solver/src/app/screens/OverlayBuilderScreen.tsx",
    "pips-solver/src/app/components/ExtractionComparisonModal.tsx",
    "pips-solver/src/services/extraction/validation/gridValidator.ts"
  ]
}

task_intent.title: Add Extraction Comparison/Diff View
task_intent.description: Allow users to compare extraction results from different AI models side-by-side. This surfaces per-model responses stored during debug mode for manual verification and enables cell-by-cell disagreement analysis.
